snippet.title: Tales from The Dancing Moon - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Please enjoy the second trailer for Tales from The Dancing Moon, highlighting some story and seasonal elements of the game.

Tales from the Dancing Moon is a casual story-driven RPG that has elements of life-simulation, crafting, building and survival. All layered on top of a thread of mystery. Presented with a detailed isometric style, inspired by classic role-playing games.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782420/Tales_from_The_Dancing_Moon/
Itch.io: https://charliebanks.itch.io/tales-from-the-dancing-moon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DancingMoonGame
